mapper.select: select * from (select v.*,IFNULL(l.levelName,'暂无级别') levelName,IFNULL(l.discountNum,0.0) discountNum from `i_vip` v left join i_vip_level l on v.buyNum >= l.minNum and v.buyNum < l.maxNum) s where s.phone = #{phone}
mapper.update: update i_vip set money = money+#{money},buyNum = buyNum+#{money} where phone = #{phone}
mapper.select: select * from (select v.*,IFNULL(l.levelName,'暂无级别') levelName,IFNULL(l.discountNum,0.0) discountNum from `i_vip` v left join i_vip_level l on v.buyNum >= l.minNum and v.buyNum < l.maxNum) s where concat(s.name,s.phone,s.levelName) like '%${input}%'
mapper.update: update i_vip set state = #{event} where id = #{id}
